text: Mach, wɨram untɨm Farisind wɨram kɨra ya Mosesɨnd injambɨr ahe sɨkahɨnd hamb mbɨ wamŋgɨz, Jisasɨv wɨram kɨra ekwanz uŋkɨ ŋaŋɨndmen mach wɨram kɨra enta kɨvah sɨzɨnd hamen hanave ŋgarɨwi unsa pamɨnd namŋgɨmar. Avɨz wɨram untɨm Farisind hamb Jisasɨnd sezɨr han mbanave amarɨmŋgɨmar. Utɨndɨv Jisasɨv wɨram kɨra ekwanz uŋkɨ ŋaŋɨndmen mach wɨram kɨra enta kɨvah sɨzɨnd hamen ŋgarɨwi unsa pamɨnd namŋgi arɨmŋgɨmar.
